message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand that $90 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?

I understand that $95 is still a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation rounds. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $102. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $99?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. I can offer it to you for $101. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you at $100. This is my final offer, please let me know if it's acceptable.
